Season01/2018-12-28.html: could,要用虚拟语气。同样的还有
starved.（口语里有时候也这么说）
别人说话，没有听清楚，没听懂，或是不敢相信的时候，可以说
如果我18岁，那我肯定会去那儿的。
当因果关系非常明显的话，就不说了
排比句的话，声调：升~升~升~...降
无力的；无效的；虚弱的；阳萎的
无所不能的；全能的；同义词：invinc
自己说错话的时候，也可以说
（口语也有这么说的，注意：仅限于口语）
Season01/2018-12-27.html: 你要开车送我去上班吗？
Season01/2018-12-26.html: 不是我不尊重你，是我太忙了。
做形容词，表开着的，开业的，i
听到坏消息的时候，条件反射。
听到对方有好的消息，条件反射得可以这么说。
听到赞赏的时候，条件反射。
通过睡觉度过电影的时间

Season01/2018-12-28.html.body:
Episode 4, Season 1.
台词
1.If I were omnipotent for a day, I would want ,um, world peace, no more hunger, good things for the rain forest. And bigger boobs.

omnipotent [ɑm'nɪpətənt]

adj. 无所不能的；全能的；同义词：invincible [ɪn'vɪnsəbl] 不可战胜的，无敌的


world peace 世界和平

hunger n.饥饿

adj. hungry 饥饿的 I am hungry
famished ['fæmɪʃt] adj. 极饥饿的 (相对高端一点的词汇)
starving adj. 饥饿的；挨饿的 I am starving; 我饿死了。 I am starved.（口语里有时候也这么说）
starving to death 饿死了
I could eat a horse right now. 我饿死了。这里注意 could,要用虚拟语气。同样的还有 couldn't agree more


boob [buːb] 表示胸

同义词：breast [brɛst] 胸，乳房
breast-feed 母乳喂养
breast milk 母乳

Hooters 快餐店（猫头鹰餐厅）
hooter ['hutɚ] 猫头鹰，汽笛 俚语表示胸
rack [ræk] 也可以表示胸 You have a nice rack. 这里是单数
cleavage ['klivɪdʒ] 事业线，乳沟

If I were ..., I would ... 虚拟

Just saying.
If I were your dad, I would beat the hell out of you.
Beyonce: 《If I were a boy》也是虚拟
If I were 18 right now, I would totally go there. 如果我18岁，那我肯定会去那儿的。
If I were you, I would... 如果我是你的话。
If I was... （口语也有这么说的，注意：仅限于口语）


intonation [,ɪntə'neʃən] 声调

排比句的话，声调：升~升~升~...降
I like apples, bananas and oranges.
I saw Lily, Lucy, Tom, Peter and Bingo.
I've been London, New York City and Dallas.



2.You took mine, so....

so...
当因果关系非常明显的话，就不说了
A:Hey, You wanna go out tonight?
B: I have an early morning, and it's raining outside, so...



3.Excuse me?

Excuse me
表示 Sorry，不好意思，打扰一下
别人说话，没有听清楚，没听懂，或是不敢相信的时候，可以说 Excuse me
借过
自己说错话的时候，也可以说 Excuse me
口语里常简说为：'Scuse me.



4.(What would you do if you were omnipotent?) If little Joey's dead, then I got no reason to live, you know?

little Joey' 小Joey（Joey的小鸡鸡）
impotent ['ɪmpətənt] adj. 无力的；无效的；虚弱的；阳萎的
笑点在于 Joey 听错 omnipotent 和 impotent 了

Season01/2018-12-27.html.body:
Episode 3, Season 1.
台词
1.How did it go ? 进展怎么样

go

走
进展，比如别人参加完 interview，你可以问：How did it go? 打招呼可以用：Hey, how is it going?
How did the meeting go? 会议进展怎么样？
The wedding did not go well. 婚礼进展不怎么样。
表支撑，撑得住 Can you go 2 hours without using your phone?
I can't go 3 days without water.


发音

it 的 t 不发音 => how did i go. => how di di go.
Simplicity is the beauty of language. 语言之美在于简洁
how what when why who where + did   did => 'd
Where did you go => Where'd you go
Who did you talk to => Who'd you talk to
Why did you go => Why'd you go
How did it go => how'd it go => how di go
Where did Tom go = Where'd Tom go?  (后面接辅音的话，d 停顿不发音)



2.He walked me to the subway.

中英文

中文：去洗澡
英文：具体 take a shower 冲个澡; take a bath 泡个澡.


I just...: 

I just got home. 我刚到家。
We just broke up. 我们刚分手。
I just walked past your house. 我走路经过你家。
I just ran past your house. 我跑步经过你家。
I just drove past your house. 我开车经过你家。


walk someone to...: 走路送某人

Can you walk me home? 你能走路送我回家吗？
Do you want me to walk you to the office? 你送我去办公室吗？


drive someone to...: 开车送某人

Can you drive me home? 你能开车送我回家吗？
Do you want me to drive you to the office? 你要开车送我去上班吗？


fly someone to... : 开飞机送某人

Fly me to the moon. 开飞机送我到月球上。


subway 地铁

metro ['mɛtro] 也表示地铁
underground 地铁（英国）
tube 也有地铁的意思
Line 2 2号线。 transfer 换乘



3.You will never see me naked.

naked ['nekɪd] 裸体的
男性上衣 shirt, 光膀子叫 shirtless
top 多用于女性的上衣。topless
nude [nud] 也表示裸体的 nude scenes 电影的裸体镜头。



4.Since when? Since always.

since always
since always = since forever 一直是这样
A: I can't get on my facebook.
B: Sorry. It's blocked here.
A: Since when?
B: Since always.



5. Cushions the blow.

cushion ['kʊʃən] 
n.垫子
v.缓冲 cushion the fall 缓冲你的重力



6.Smoke away!

在一些动词后面加 away 往往表示 ”尽情地...“ Drink away! 尽情地喝吧; Dance away; 尽情地跳吧

7.Now try taking a puff.

take a puff
吸口烟 take a puff = take a drag. Can I take a drag? 能不能让我吸一口？
bum a cigarette: Can I bum a cigarette?/ cig? 我能跟你借根烟吗？



8. Now, don't think of it as a cigarette.

think of something as...
think of something as ...当成什么 Don't think of it as your obligation [,ɑblɪ'ɡeʃən].不要把它当成你的义务
think of someone as ...  Think of me as your ex-boyfriend. 把我当成你的前男友。

Season01/2018-12-26.html.body:
Episode 2, Season 1.
台词
1.Yeah,right. You serious?

Yeah,right. 语气不同，意思不同

表示一般的，"嗯，对"
表示 "你快拉倒吧"、"我才不信呢" A: Do you like her? B: No, I don't. A: Yeah, right. 

类似的词还有 Great

表示 "太棒了"
表示 "这下好了" Great, It's raining. 这下好了，又下雨了。


You serious?

省略了 are. 口语经常会省略：You happy?

条件反射
Good for you. 听到对方有好的消息，条件反射得可以这么说。
A: I got a new girl friend. B: Good for you.
Sorry to hear thar. / That's too bad. 听到坏消息的时候，条件反射。
A: My flight got canceled. B: Oh, sorry to hear that.
Thank you. 听到赞赏的时候，条件反射。
A: Hey, you look beautiful today. B: Thank you.


2.Kissing is pretty much like an opening act.

opening act 序幕

opening ceremony 开业典礼
opening night 开业当晚 It's there opening night.


pretty much 差不多，基本上

A: Are you done? 忙完了吗？ B: Pretty much. 差不多了。
That’s all for today./ That’s pretty much it for today. 今天就这么多


open

作动词，表打开，open it. open the door.
做形容词，表开着的，开业的，Is it still open? 他们家还开着吗？It’s open 24/7. 他们24小时营业。



3.It’s like the stand-up comedian you have to sit through.

stand up

表起立， Come on, stand up.
表把谁扶起来，Can you stand me up? 你能把我扶起来吗？
表示放某人鸽子，stand someone up. Don’t stand me up again. 别放我鸽子。He stood me up last night.他昨晚爽约了。


stand-up comedian

表单口相声，脱口秀。


sit through

sit through something. 耐着性子，忍着看完。 His lectures are too boring. I don’t want to sit through another one.
sit through a movie.
sleep through a movie. 通过睡觉度过电影的时间
A: Did you watch Mission Impossible?
B: Yeah I did.
A: What was it about?
B: I don’t know. I slept through most of it ./ all of it.



4.and it’s not that we don’t like the comedian. It’s just … it’s not why we bought the ticket.

It’s not that… 不是...而是 (否定肯定式)

It’s not that I don’t respect you enough. It’s just I’m really busy. 不是我不尊重你，是我太忙了。
吾爱吾师，吾更爱真理
I love my teacher, but I love the truth more.
It’s not that I don’t love my teacher. It’s just I love the truth more.(这个表达更好)

还可以省略 It's
Not that I don't love my teacher. It's just I love the truth more.

Season01/2018-12-25.html.body:
Episode 1, Season 1.
前言

学习英语是一个持久的过程，不会一蹴而就，不要急躁。
学习词汇、语法、发音、语调、文化还有思维表达。

知识点

season ['sizn]，季节，也表示剧的季。
episode ['ɛpɪsod]，插曲，一段情节。这里表示第几集。

台词
1.Come on. You’re going out witha guy. There’s gotta be something wrong with him.

Come on 语调不一样，意思也不一样。

快点儿 Hurry up
加油 Go, go go
我才不信呢 I don’t believe it. (oh, come on)
拜托了 Please (come on~~please)
不公平 It’s not fair.


Go out 对象不一样，意思也不一样

滚，出去 go out
出去（用作自己）I don’t wanna go out. It’s raining outside.
出去玩 Let’s go out, man. Are you going out tonight? 
约会 Are you going out with anyone lately? She and I have been going out for a year.


Guy

用作单数只能表示男的。I like this guy. 但是很少用 hey, guy.
复数的话表示大家（不分性别）。Hey, guys. I love you guys.


Gotta

表必需 I gotta go. 我得走了
You gotta trust me. 你要相信我


Have gotta/Has gotta  gotta 的完整形式

I have gotta go = I’ve gotta go
She has gotta go = She’s gotta go


There’s gotta

There’s gotta = There has gotta


‘d better do 最好

‘d better do = You’d better tell me the truth. 你最好告诉我真相


There’s gotta be…: 肯定有

There’s gotta be a way. 肯定有方法。
There’s gotta be a girl. 肯定有个女孩。


Has gotta = has to :

There has to be a way. 肯定有方法。
There has to be a girl. 肯定有个女孩。


Wrong with…: 有什么问题

What’s wrong with you? 你怎么了。
Nothing is wrong with me. 我没什么事。


With him   him 弱读 [həm] ,然后再扔掉 h. 整体读音 [wɪðəm]

I like him.
about him.
tell him.



2. So does he have a hump and a hairpiece?

hump [hʌmp] n. 驼峰；驼背；圆形隆起物 vi. 隆起；弓起；努力；急速行进 vt. 使隆起；使烦恼

驼背 She has a hump. You’re not gonna like her. 她驼背，你不会喜欢她的。
俚语里有 fuck 的意思。


hairpiece ['hɛrpis] 假发

遮丑的用 hairpiece
装扮用的 wig [wɪɡ] 假发
